dataList.name: Iron Maiden - Defibrillation
dataList.desc: When Staggered, recover from Stagger and end this turn (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: All of My Corpus has been Given to Tibia
dataList.desc:
Take -30% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Burst], and [Sinking]; -30% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]
Take -50% damage from [Laceration]

Turn Start: If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger. Afterward, gain 2 [CrimsonTakeDamageUp] and becomes unable to use 'Installation Art no. 3: Improvised Ribcage' until next turn (once per Encounter)

Turn End: Gain 1 [DefenseDown] next turn for every 4 [Combustion] on self (max 15)

dataList.name: Corpus-centric Art
dataList.desc:
When this unit enters the Encounter, heal 30 SP

On Hit with Attack Skill: If this unit inflicts negative effect and gains beneficial effect simultaneously, heal 4 SP at Attack End
- If this unit is at max SP when healing SP with the above effect, gain 1 [ResultEnhancement] next turn (once per turn)
dataList.flavor: A form of art that sculpts and exhibits artworks using bones and muscles as the material. Each act of creation incorporates even the tiniest of bone shards into the artist's intricately-crafted weapon.

dataList.name: The Aesthetics of Harvesting and Trimming the Ingredient On-site
dataList.desc: After using a Skill, gain 30 [HumanBoneTheRings] and 1 [HumanBloodTheRings] for every target damaged by this unit's Skill

dataList.name: Magnum Opus: Tibia
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 206 [HumanBoneTheRings] and 5 [HumanBloodTheRings], reduce the Stack of each effect equal to those numbers respectively and gain 1 [MineTheRings] Turn Start: If this unit has [MineTheRings], use a powerful attack this turn When hit by an Attack Skill before using the powerful attack, gain 1 [PlusCoinValueDown] and 1 [ResultReduction] (once per Skill; max 3 times per turn)
dataList.flavor: Tibia, the work of the artist's life, completed by breaking his own corpus and pouring his blood to the last drop—in the most literal sense.

dataList.name: Artwork Pleasing to the Senses
dataList.desc:
When [MineTheRings] expires, the following units heal 30 SP and gain 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [DefenseUp] next turn:
- The Ring Nursefather - Callisto
- The Ring Apprentice - Albina
- Corpus Theater[TabExplain]

dataList.name: Allow Me to Briefly Enjoy My Pupil's Exhibition
dataList.desc: If this unit has [SupportProtect], lose 1 [SupportProtect] on Clash Start (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Transcend the Corpus
dataList.desc:
At less than 50% HP, recover from Stagger and end this turn
- Following the activation of this effect, equip 'Closing Time - Installation Art no. 1: Your Flesh and Bones as the Gallery's Seats' on this unit's last Skill Slot at the start of the next turn

dataList.name: Please, Do Stop Running and Be Seated
dataList.desc: Turn End: Inflict [RedemptionTheRings] to the Sinner and Assist Unit with the fastest Speed

dataList.name: Bondage
dataList.desc:
Apply the following effects to the unit tethered to Corpus Theater:
- Become 'immobilized'
- This unit's buffs, HP, and SP cannot be changed

dataList.name: Ingredient Harvest
dataList.desc: If Corpus Theater is destroyed by the Ring Nursefather, the tethered unit becomes unavailable for the Encounter

dataList.name: Escape from the Art
dataList.desc:
If Corpus Theater is destroyed by units other than the Ring Nursefather, activate the following effects:
- The tethered unit returns to battle next turn; if the unit is at less than 10 SP, heal SP to 10
- The Ring Nursefather and The Ring Apprentice lose 10 SP
- Gain 2 E.G.O Resource for all Affinities

dataList.name: Flammable Material
dataList.desc: Take x2 damage from [Combustion]

dataList.name: The Pulse and Beat of Corpus-turned-Ingredient
dataList.desc:
Take -30% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Burst], and [Sinking]; -30% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]
Take -50% damage from [Laceration]

Turn End: Gain 1 [DefenseDown] next turn for every 4 [Combustion] on self (max 15)
dataList.flavor:
Fascia is made of Albina's flesh and blood.
Now, Albina has only the brain, while Fascia lacks only the brain.
Food for thought: Which of them possesses the true corpus?

dataList.name: Corporism
dataList.desc:
On Hit with Attack Skills: If this unit inflicts negative effect and gains beneficial effect simultaneously, heal 4 SP
- If this unit is at max SP when healing SP with the above effect, gain 1 [Agility] next turn (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Fascia, My Precious Artwork
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 2 [HumanFleshTheRings], remove [HumanFleshTheRings] and gain [BoneBladeTheRings] next turn Turn Start: If this unit has [BoneBladeTheRings], use a powerful attack this turn When hit by an Attack Skill before using the powerful attack, gain 1 [PlusCoinValueDown] and 1 [ResultReduction] (once per Skill; max 3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Visitors Must Respect the Rules of the Gallery
dataList.desc: If this unit has [SupportProtect], lose 1 [SupportProtect] on Clash Start (once per Skill)

dataList.name: With this Artwork, I will Prove Myself before the Maestro
dataList.desc: At less than 20 SP when the Ring Nursefather enters the Encounter, heal SP to 20

dataList.name: Vengeance Tattoos [<s>Great Brother</s>]
dataList.desc:
Takes -30% damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], and [Burst] (rounded down)
-50% to the amount of Stagger Threshold raised (rounded down)

dataList.name: The Book of Vengeance
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Inflict [VengeanceBookSpider] on all Sinners and LCD units

If this unit hit with more than 3 Skills this turn, gain 1 [ReinforcedTattooSpider] next turn for every excess Skill that hit

dataList.name: My Daughter's Education
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win, gain 1 [DaughterEducationSpider]

On Hit with a Skill, gain 1 [DaughterEducationSpider] (once per Skill; this effect does not activate for Cracked Coins)

On Clash Win with the first-used Skill in a turn, gain 1 more [DaughterEducationSpider] and the Skill gains Coin Power +1

dataList.name: Resentment
dataList.desc:
When hit by 2 Skills, gain 1 [ResentmentSpider] and lose 1 [DaughterEducationSpider] (number of hits taken is always tracked)

At max [ResentmentSpider] Stack, use a powerful attack

Turn End: At less than 80% / 60% / 40% HP, max out this unit's [ResentmentSpider] Stack

dataList.name: Vengeance Tattoos Max Output... Unseal Lævateinn!
dataList.desc:
When [MiddleFatherSwordFour] is unsealed, this unit gains [MiddleFatherGuts]

Targets the unit with [MosesRedBreathCharge]

dataList.name: Am I doing this right, Papa?!
dataList.desc:
Begins Encounter with [HeatingWireOffSpider]

Turn Start: At 3+ [GotACompliment], gain [HeatingWireOnSpider] for the turn and also inflict [Combustion] with Skills that inflict [Laceration]

Turn End: At less than 3 [GotACompliment], convert this unit's [HeatingWireOnSpider] to [HeatingWireOffSpider]
dataList.flavor: 'I like my papa because he always praises me and buys me comic books.'

dataList.name: The Middle Styled Tattoos
dataList.desc: If this unit hit with more than 2 Skills, gain 1 [ReinforcedTattooSpiderDaughter] next turn for every excess Skill that hit
dataList.flavor: 'Will the bigger Sisters and Brothers of the Middle accept me as their family one day, so I can continue to live with them?'

dataList.name: Praise is the Wind in Her Sail
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win, gain 1 [GotACompliment]

On Hit with a Skill, gain 1 [GotACompliment] (once per Skill; this effect does not activate for Cracked Coins)

On Clash Win with the first-used Skill in a turn, gain 1 more [GotACompliment] and the Skill gains Coin Power +1

dataList.name: I'm pretty sure the Middle never forgets
dataList.desc:
When hit by 2 Skills, gain 1 [ResentmentSpiderDaughter] and lose 1 [GotACompliment] (number of hits taken is always tracked)

At max [ResentmentSpiderDaughter] Stack, use a powerful attack

Turn End: At less than 80% / 60% / 40% HP, max out this unit's [ResentmentSpiderDaughter] Stack

dataList.name: Am I doing this right, Papa?!
dataList.desc:
Begins Encounter with [HeatingWireOffSpider]

Turn Start: At 3+ [GotACompliment], gain [HeatingWireOnSpider] for the turn and also inflict [Combustion] with Skills that inflict [Laceration]

Turn End: At less than 3 [GotACompliment], convert this unit's [HeatingWireOnSpider] to [HeatingWireOffSpider]

dataList.name: Whoa... That looks mad dangerous!
dataList.desc:
If the Middle Nursefather has [MiddleFatherSwordFour], does not enter [HeatingWireOffSpider] state

Targets the unit with [MosesRedBreathCharge]
dataList.flavor: The combination of her animalistic instincts and battle experience is screaming at her in unison: Whatever that red thing is, if she can't stop that attack from going off, it will kill.

dataList.name: Grueling Battle
dataList.desc:
Begins battle with 20% missing HP
For the first 3 turns of the Encounter, gain 2 [ResultReduction]
dataList.flavor:
Meeting a Color Fixer in battle is doubtless an experience that will elevate his skills to the next level.
If he survives this battle, that is.

dataList.name: Crumbling Form
dataList.desc:
Gain the following effects based on the target's [DuelEdge] Stack
- For every Stack, deal +10% damage against and take -10% damage from the target with [DuelEdge]
- At 3+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Clash Power +1
- At 5+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Base Power +1
- At 7+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Coin Power +1
- At 10+ Stack, in a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], gain Final Power +1

dataList.name: Desperate Struggle
dataList.desc: After the Thumb Nursefather enters the field, deactivate the "Hunter's Mark" Passive and gain the following effects instead: - At less than 30 SP, heal up to 30 SP - Turn Start: Gain 3 [SupportProtect] - Can Clash regardless of Speed - Prioritize Clashing against Vergilius - When the Thumb Nursefather wins a Clash, and uses an Attack against the target, follow up with "Colpi Sottani" as an Unopposed Attack against the same target (2 times per turn)
dataList.flavor:
'Maybe I can kill her now. Maybe this is my chance.'

Once again, the same contemplation comes to seize Lucio as he looms over his master, who lies fast asleep.
But this impulse remains an unactioned thought, for he had both fear born from experience and gratitude for his deliverance from the Backstreets.
Yet, his resentment runs too deep. Lucio makes a promise with himself, even as he swears utter fealty without a trace of deception:
'Once this battle is behind us, I will kill her. I will gouge out her other eye and stab and slash at her, again and again, until she no longer moves.'
For the first time, fire burns in the eyes of the boy whose body is covered in bruises.

dataList.name: Hunter's Mark
dataList.desc:
Randomly select an enemy, reduce their Speed to 1, and target it with all of this unit's Skills
Activates every 4 turns after the initial activation

dataList.name: Duello Disperato
dataList.desc:
After Clashing, inflict 1 [DuelEdge] against the target this unit Clashed against
In a Clash against targets with [DuelEdge], heal 2 SP for every [DuelEdge] Stack on target (max 10)

dataList.name: The Eye of Precognition
dataList.desc:
When this unit enters the Encounter, gain 30 [FutureEyeOn]
At 0 [FutureEyeOn] Stack, convert [FutureEyeOn] to [FutureEyeOff]
dataList.flavor: This Relic, known as the Eye of Odin, is but a third of a whole Relic that was broken into three parts.

dataList.name: Accelerating Future
dataList.desc: In a Clash, gain 1 [LookingFuture] with every Clash Can gain up to ([FutureEyeOn] Stack at Turn Start / 3) [LookingFuture] per turn While this unit has [FutureEyeOn], getting attacked by Unopposed Attacks or losing a Clash activates the "Precognition" Skill
dataList.flavor: "The more we clash, the hotter my sword will become... and accelerate to bring us to the future I foresaw."

dataList.name: Overloaded
dataList.desc:
The following causes this unit to lose [FutureEyeOn] Stack:
- If this unit fails to gain [LookingFuture], lose 1 [FutureEyeOn] with every Clash
- When this unit is attacked by an Unopposed Attack, lose 1 [FutureEyeOn]
- On Clash Lose, lose 3 [FutureEyeOn]
dataList.flavor: 'The eye's heating up, its socket is starting to ache, and my vision is turning red.'

dataList.name: La Spada di Palermo
dataList.desc:
Deal +15% more damage against Shields for every Burn on the main target (max 300%)
On Skill Use, if target's Attack Skill is either a Slash or a Pierce Skill, Clash Power +1
If this unit's Skill effects triggered [VibrationExplosion], gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn (3 times per turn)
If this unit hit Critically with its Skill effects, heal 5 SP

dataList.name: The Shame of Famiglia Bognatelli
dataList.desc:
Take -30% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Burst], [Sinking]; -30% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]
At 1+ [AccelBullet], Skills that spend [AccelBullet] deal +30% damage and deal +150% damage against Shields
Gain 4 [Breath] for every [AccelBullet] spent
When flipping a Coin that spends [AccelBullet], does not cancel the attack even if this unit does not have Acceleration Round
dataList.flavor:
"You were an inheritor of the Palermitan style and a wielder of our family heirloom—you had every privilege one could ever hope for. How dare you embarrass yourself like this?"
"We'll let you keep the Relic and the sword, for they have been defiled by your dishonorable stench."
"To be promoted to the station of a Sottocapo, an Underboss... only to be ousted in a mere 3 days. No one else has suffered such pathetic humiliation apart from you, Valencina."
"You are the shame of our family. La Famiglia Bognatelli withdraws its love from you."

dataList.name: Shin (心) - Valencina
dataList.desc: When hit, or when "The Thumb Apprentice - Lucio" is defeated, gain [ObsessionAndGreed] next turn
dataList.flavor: "*sigh* Okay. So, you're saying we can get Ticket back by going in and wrecking the place according to that fanatic's plan... Is this really going to bring Ticket back to us?"

dataList.name: Lucio, you useless little shit!
dataList.desc: When "The Thumb Apprentice - Lucio" is defeated, activate "Time to Hunt" Passive

dataList.name: Time to Hunt
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger

Select a random Sinner and inflict [TeachersPrey]
- Activates every 4 turns after the initial activation
- If this unit kills the target with the Skill "Disposal," activate it again next turn
dataList.flavor:
The Palermitan Style has much in common with the originator of the sword technique—La Famiglia Bognatelli.
Both the Famiglia and the sword style are renowned for relentlessly focusing on a single prey during a hunt, which is concluded with a Coup de Grâce that may as well be called a dissection. These executions are not carried out in the shadows, but instead, proudly put on display for all to behold.
The spectacular and formidable sword style has granted the Famiglia much honor and prestige, eventually securing them a place among the Sette Famiglie of the Backstreets.
Valencina, a master of the Palermitan Style, used it to hunt and execute many officers and so-called battle-hardened soldiers during the Smoke War, becoming a veritable "War Hero."
Ironically, no one could have imagined her fall would sink as low as her fame once soared.

dataList.name: All of My Corpus has been Given to Tibia
dataList.desc:
Take -30% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Burst], and [Sinking]; -30% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]
Take -50% damage from [Laceration]

Turn Start: If this unit is Staggered, recover from Stagger. Afterward, gain 2 [CrimsonTakeDamageUp] (once per Encounter)

Turn End: Gain 1 [DefenseDown] next turn for every 4 [Combustion] on self (max 15)
dataList.flavor: Soon, the masterpiece shall be completed—the raison d'être of the House of Spiders. The Golden Boughs are... interesting objet, to be sure, but the fact remains that they are not essential to the perfection of the masterpiece. I doubt if it was truly necessary to seize them and risk making an enemy out of Limbus Company... although I do admit these sloppy dance steps did, in the end, come together to form a rather acceptable finale. In any case, this series of circumstances we find ourselves in was Rien's desire—or more precisely, the pleasure of the so-called god he puts his faith in. One must wonder, however... Is it a blessing or a curse to be so compellingly loved by such a thing referred to as "god"? Fuhuhu...

dataList.name: Corporism
dataList.desc:
On Hit with Attack Skills: If this unit inflicts negative effect and gains positive effect simultaneously, heal 4 SP at Attack End
- If this unit is at max SP when healing SP with the above effect, gain 1 [ResultEnhancement] next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Allow Me to Briefly Enjoy My Pupil's Exhibition
dataList.desc: If this unit has [SupportProtect], lose 1 [SupportProtect] on Clash Start (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Healthy Corpus Leads to Healthy Ingredient
dataList.desc: This unit deals +150% damage to the Sinner and Assist Unit with the highest level and prioritizes attacking them
dataList.flavor:
"But once you have reached a certain level of mastery, it is best to aim for the most robust corpus among your ingredients."
"You see, a healthy corpus may provide ample pieces of muscles and bones to broaden the scope and scale of the artwork."
"Such exciting prospects, yes, dear Albina?"

dataList.name: Magnum Opus: Tibia
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 206 [HumanBoneTheRings] and 5 [HumanBloodTheRings], reduce Stack of each effect equal to those numbers and gain 1 [MineTheRings] Turn Start: If this unit has [MineTheRings], use a powerful attack this turn When hit by an Attack Skill before using the powerful attack, gain 1 [PlusCoinValueDown] and 1 [ResultReduction] (once per Skill; max 3 times per turn)
dataList.flavor: Tibia, the work of the artist's life, completed by breaking his own corpus and pouring his blood to the last drop—in the most literal sense.

dataList.name: Visitors Must Respect the Rules of the Gallery
dataList.desc: If this unit has [SupportProtect], lose 1 [SupportProtect] on Clash Start (once per Skill)

dataList.name: Ingredient Selection
dataList.desc: This character prioritizes attacking the Sinner and Assist Unit with the lowest level
dataList.flavor:
"I'll harvest the muscles and bones of the weakest one first."
"The ingredients might not cut it, but I'll be able to harvest better ones as I craft and display more artworks."
"What an exciting prospect, right, dear Fascia?"

dataList.desc: (미사용 패시브)

dataList.name: Afterimage of the Future
dataList.desc: Every few turns, use the "Destinated Opponent" Skill Only the target of this unit's attack can Clash with the said Skill Slot If this unit's "Destinated Opponent" Skill loses a Clash, take 36 ~ 60 fixed damage Combat End: If every "Destinated Opponent" Skill this unit used in this turn lost a Clash, gain 1 [Vulnerable] next turn
(미사용 패시브)

dataList.name: Tiansha Star's Bladewound [天殺星傷]
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: Gain [LvDownLittleFingerBossTwo] and 4 [TimeEntangleUnstable]

dataList.name: From Dawn till Dusk
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: At 0+ SP, gain 1 [SojiAbiAgeFuture]
Gain 1 [SojiAbiAgeFuture] for every 2 SP above 0

Turn Start: At less than 0 SP, gain 1 [SojiAbiAgePast]
Gain 1 [SojiAbiAgePast] for every 2 SP below 0
dataList.flavor: The past, the present, the future—the myriad moments converge together, rendering the distinction of time meaningless. Youthful and aged selves alike are pulled into the here and now from every point along the continuum of time.

dataList.name: Spacetime Afterimage Collapse
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Gain 1 [TimeEntangleUnstable] for every 5 SP difference between this unit's current SP and SP at Turn Start (max 5 per turn)

For every 100 damage taken cumulatively, lose 1 [TimeEntangleUnstable] (including Shield damage)
dataList.flavor: 'The afterimages that have long wrapped me in their folds are stripped away, layer by layer... and I am left standing in both loss and liberation.'

dataList.name: Will of the Prescript
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Gain Shield equal to 20% of max HP (remains throughout this Encounter)

Turn Start:
- Gain [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] based on [UnlockBuff_Base] stage on self
- Inflict [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] to a random enemy and prioritize attacking that enemy (excluding certain pattern)

Deal +2.5% damage to [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (max 20%)
- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], deal +30% damage to all targets instead

dataList.name: Undertake Prescript
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was executed this turn, heal 15 SP and gain [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] by ([UnlockBuff_Base] stage + 1) (once per turn)

Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was not executed this turn, gain 1 [PressureOfPrescript] and 10 [KarmaOfIndexStudent]
- If this unit's [UnlockBuff_Base] stage is below 2, gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy]
- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], does not gain [KarmaOfIndexStudent]

- Gain [EsteemNeeds] equal to [PressureOfPrescript] gained every time this unit gains [PressureOfPrescript]

dataList.name: Unlock
dataList.desc:
Turn End: At 6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] or at 80%-/60%- HP,
- Gain [UnlockBuff_2]/[UnlockBuff_3]
- Heal to 45 SP
- Consume all [PressureOfPrescript] and recover from Stagger

If [UnlockBuff_Base] was gained based on HP conditional above,
- Gain [KarmaOfIndexStudent] by (sum of healed SP / 15)
- Increase [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] to 6/9 if this unit had less than 6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy]; gain 1 [DefenseDown] and 2 [KarmaOfIndexStudent] next turn for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] gained

Min & Max Speed +10 in the turn this unit uses its powerful attack

dataList.name: Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration
dataList.desc:
For this Encounter, maintain Effloresced[TabExplain] E.G.O::Procuration state
- Encounter Start: Gain [UnlockBuff_1] and 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy]
- Gain [Blandishment_Enemy] and a different set of Resistance values while in this state
- SP does not drop below 0

dataList.name: Concentration
dataList.desc:
At [UnlockBuff_3], apply the following effects:
- [Blandishment_Shin_Enemy], gain Shield equal to 50% of max HP (lasts for the rest of this Encounter)
- Intensify [PressureOfPrescript] to [PressureOfPrescript_2nd] and max out its Stack
- Turn Start: Gain 1 [PressureOfPrescript_2nd]

dataList.name: The Orthodox Blade [整劍]
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: gain 50 [DicipleLittleFinger]

dataList.name: Training to Inherit the Name of a Star
dataList.desc: After Attack Skill End, deal (# of Slash Coins that hit Critically x 10) Slash damage against each target (cannot be Staggered due to this damage)

dataList.name: Singular Focus of the Mind
dataList.desc:
This unit's [Breath] Potency is capped at 25
Any excess [Breath] Potency gained past 25 will be converted to [DicipleLittleFinger]

Gain [Fugacious] equal to [DicipleLittleFinger] lost every time this unit loses [DicipleLittleFinger] Stack

dataList.name: Tranquility [靜念]
dataList.desc:
If this unit has [DicipleLittleFinger], gain the following effects:
- SP does not drop below 0; if it was below 0, recover to 0
- Convert any SP damage taken into Gloom damage (save for SP changes due to "Base factors increasing/decreasing Sanity")

dataList.name: Grace
dataList.desc:
In a Clash against targets that aren't Ryōshū, Clash Power -2
Take -20% damage from targets other than Ryōshū

dataList.name: The Emperor's Subjects
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 50 [DefenseBug] (Gain 3 fewer [DefenseBug] with every subsequent turn; max reduction 20) - If this unit has [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking], reduce their Potency by a random value; then, lose the same Stacks of [DefenseBug] as that random value - If the above effects are at 1 Potency but has 2+ Count, reduce their Count instead If all [DefenseBug] was lost during the combat phase, gain the following effects next turn: - Gain 10 [DefenseDown] instead of gaining [DefenseBug] - Generate 2 E.G.O resources for each of the 3 least-owned Affinities - Turn End: Remove all negative effects from this unit and start gaining [DefenseBug] again
dataList.flavor: They crawl out unheralded from betwixt all the lines that form where walls meet.

dataList.name: The Emperor's Mantle
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain ([DefenseBug] x 40) Shield
dataList.flavor: The Legion of Roaches moves for no one but its Emperor.

dataList.name: The Emperor's Legion
dataList.desc:
- On Clash Win, inflict 3 [OffenseBug] on target
- On Hit with a Skill, inflict 1 [OffenseBug] on target
dataList.flavor: Rip, seep, trickle, carve, tear, devour.

dataList.name: The Emperor's Blood
dataList.desc:
Take -50% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Burst], and [Sinking]; -50% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]
Cannot be Staggered due to this damage
Turn Start: Gain 2 [ResultReduction] for every 25% missing HP on the Core
dataList.flavor: 'Become dulled and inured to all things.'

dataList.name: The Unwrapped Present
dataList.desc: This unit's SP value cannot affect the outcome of Coin flips, which is fixed to 50-50 On Clash Win against Sinners, lose 5 SP and deal -40% damage against them When in Low Morale or Panic states, gain [ParryingResultDown] and [ResultReduction] When recovering from Panic, gain 2 [ResultReduction]
dataList.flavor: 'Are there really no more wrappings underneath?'

dataList.name: The Emperor's Wrath
dataList.desc:
At 50% HP, or when Staggered, recover from Stagger and remove all negative effects on this unit and gain a new pattern
Then, gain the following effects:
- Reset SP to 0
- Gain 50 [DefenseBug]
- Double the amount of [OffenseBug] inflicted by the Passive "The Emperor's Legion"

dataList.name: Rien, The Index Nursefather
dataList.desc: Take -50% damage from Unopposed Attacks Take -50% damage from [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] When healing SP from [UnlockBuff_Base], if this unit's SP is below 0, heal up to 0 SP Encounter Start: Gain [BurningWoundRien_Mask] At 55% HP, gain a new pattern - Remove all effects other than those exclusive to this unit - Reset [StackRienSpecialSkill] Stack to 0
dataList.flavor:
I waited for "the moment" as the Prescript told me to.
Even after my darling daughter left, I waited.

And after a while, I was contacted by Limbus Company, and saw that the Backdoor was open.
That's when the device beeped and let me know that it was finally time to bring my daughter home.

dataList.name: Oracle Device [Caduceus]
dataList.desc: A random weapon is assigned to every Coin. Each weapon has a unique effect. - [RienWeapon01Hatchet] - [RienWeapon02Stiletto] - [RienWeapon03Greatsword] - [RienWeapon04Rapier] - [RienWeapon05Sledgehammer] - [RienWeapon06Ultragreatsword] - [RienWeapon07Lance] - [RienWeapon08Chain] - [RienWeapon09Scythe] When using an Attack Skill, gain 1 [StackRienSpecialSkill] (max 9) - Can be gained once per Skill; does not gain Stack from the same Skill twice Turn Start: At 9 [StackRienSpecialSkill] Stacks, use a powerful Skill - After Attack using the powerful Skill for the first time, gain [Shin_Rien] - Reset the per-Skill [StackRienSpecialSkill] cap - Min & Max Speed +25 - Turn End: Gain 1 [Vulnerable] and 2 [ResultReduction] next turn Turn 5 Start: At less than 9 [StackRienSpecialSkill], bring its Stack to 9; then, gain (Stack gained x 5) [KarmaOfIndexRien] - Then, activate this effect every 4 turns
dataList.flavor:
A vial of what looks like liquid metal capable of changing its shape and mass, its qualities almost like those of Singularities, swishes inside the Device.
The form the fluid takes is contingent on the Prescript the Device receives. The weapons it produces depend on the information regarding the target and the time limit given to carry out the assassination.
One day, as he received a dagger too small for the task, he elected to wait until it produced a different weapon. However, despite the approaching deadline, it refused to provide him a proper weapon; he had no choice but to kill his target with a fork.

dataList.name: Will of the Prescript
dataList.desc: Turn Start: - Gain [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] based on [UnlockBuff_Base] stage on self - Apply [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] against a random non-Ryōshū Sinner, and prioritize attacking them - When using a Skill against [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality], convert all Coins on that Skill to [SuperCoin]s · If [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] is killed, or if this unit can no longer attack that target, use the remaining Skills against a random non-Ryōshū Sinner (prioritizes targets with the least current HP) · When all other Sinners are killed, apply it to Ryōshū Deal +2.5% damage against [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (max 20%) - At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], deal +30% damage against all targets
dataList.flavor:
Do you wish me to raise a family?

"It must've been fate that brought us together. To think that I'd ever meet a husband like you..."

dataList.name: Undertake Prescript
dataList.desc: Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was executed this turn, heal 10 SP and gain 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (once per turn) Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was not executed this turn, gain 8 [KarmaOfIndexRien], and the Sinner who had [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] gains 1 [ParryingResultUp] next turn - If this unit does not have [UnlockBuff_Base], gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] at Turn End - At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], does not gain [KarmaOfIndexRien]
dataList.flavor:
Do you wish me to lose my family?

"Honey, I gotta take a quick trip up north today."
"Ah, also—hey, buddy. I'm expecting a package this afternoon, so would you be a dear and pick it up for me, sweetheart?"

dataList.name: Unlock
dataList.desc:
Turn End: At 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] or at 95%-/85%-/75%- HP,- Gain [UnlockBuff_Rien1]/[UnlockBuff_Rien2]/[UnlockBuff_Rien3]

Turn 1 End: At lower than [UnlockBuff_Base] stage 1, gain [UnlockBuff_Rien1]
Turn 4 End: At lower than [UnlockBuff_Base] stage 2, gain [UnlockBuff_Rien2]

When [UnlockBuff_Base] is activated due to HP or Turn conditionals:
- At less than 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] Stack, raise them to 3/6/9
Gain 10 [KarmaOfIndexRien] at the next Turn Start for every Stack gained
dataList.flavor: "Following the Prescripts is to unlock what is locked."

dataList.name: Rien, the Father [Imitation]
dataList.desc: Take -75% damage from Unopposed Attacks Take -75% damage from [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] When healing SP from [UnlockBuff_Base], if this unit's SP is below 15, heal up to 15 SP When this unit enters a new phase at 55% HP, gain the following effects: - Remove all effects other than those exclusive to this unit - Reset [StackRienSpecialSkill] Stack to 0 - Gain [IndexPrescript_RienSecondPhase] - Convert [BurningWoundRien_Mask] to [BurningWoundRien] - Convert [KarmaOfIndexRien] to [KarmaOfIndexRien_2Phase]; then gain 10 Stacks of that effect - If this unit does not have [Shin_Rien], immediately gain that effect At 25% or lower HP, gain a new pattern and greatly enhance a certain Skill
dataList.flavor:
Once, he harbored a suspicion that he was being shaped into an imitation of someone; he doubted the Will and nearly defied it, for he did not know whom he was to mimic. Only when it was too late did he understand its intent and come to accept the Prescript's will.
Only then was the false father completed.

dataList.name: Oracle Device [Caduceus] - Full Unlock
dataList.desc: A random weapon is assigned to every Coin. Each weapon has a unique effect. - [RienWeapon01Hatchet2phase] - [RienWeapon02Stiletto2phase] - [RienWeapon03Greatsword2phase] - [RienWeapon04Rapier2phase] - [RienWeapon05Sledgehammer2phase] - [RienWeapon06Ultragreatsword2phase] - [RienWeapon07Lance2phase] - [RienWeapon08Chain2phase] - [RienWeapon09Scythe2phase] When using an Attack Skill, gain 1 [StackRienSpecialSkill] (max 9) - Can be gained once per Skill; does not gain Stack from the same Skill twice - Does not gain Stack from a Skill used only in a special pattern Turn Start: At 9 [StackRienSpecialSkill] Stacks, use a powerful Skill - Reset the per-Skill [StackRienSpecialSkill] cap - Min & Max Speed +25 - Turn End: Gain 2 [Vulnerable] and 3 [ResultReduction] next turn Activate the following, starting from the turn in which the phase changed - Every 4 turns, at less than 9 [StackRienSpecialSkill], bring its Stack to 9; then, gain (Stack gained x 5) [KarmaOfIndexRien_2Phase]
dataList.flavor: An unparalleled weapon and a curse bestowed by Hermes, a god of the City whose Prescripts are distributed by radio waves.

dataList.name: Will of the Prescript
dataList.desc: Turn Start: - Apply [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] against a random non-Ryōshū Sinner, and prioritize attacking them - When using a Skill against [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality], convert all Coins on that Skill to [SuperCoin]s · If [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] is killed, or if this unit can no longer attack that target, use the remaining Skills against a random non-Ryōshū Sinner (prioritizes targets with the least current HP, unless they have 1 HP) · When all other Sinners are killed, apply it to Ryōshū - Gain [Protection] equal to [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (max 9) · Lose 1 Stack for every 20 [KarmaOfIndexRien_2Phase] Deal +5% damage against [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (max 40%) - At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], deal +50% damage against all targets Starting from the first turn after the phase change, activate the following effects: - Gain [BlackNightmare] every 2 turns. - When gaining [BlackNightmare], if this unit has fewer than 9 [StackRienSpecialSkill] Stack, activate a unique pattern
dataList.flavor:
I raised a family.

"You're not supposed to be here right now."
"My work is still much underway, and I'd like to carve them up in peace so they can attain the most exquisite beauty I can sculpt."
"... Don't tell me, are you here to defy the Prescript?"

dataList.name: Undertake Prescript
dataList.desc: Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was executed this turn, heal 15 SP and gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (once per turn) Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was not executed this turn, gain 10 [KarmaOfIndexRien_2Phase], lose 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], and the Sinner who had [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] gains 2 [ParryingResultUp] next turn - If this unit used a powerful Skill this turn, gain 15 [KarmaOfIndexRien_2Phase] and lose 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] instead
dataList.flavor:
I... lost my family.

"Don't go..."
"Don't go... Not... like this... Daddy... Please... help us..."

dataList.name: The Final Battle
dataList.desc:
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage and apply the following effects (once per Encounter):
- Heal max HP and remove all removable negative effects from this unit
- For this Encounter, gain 1 [Vulnerable] and fix [TimeEntangleUnstable] to 1. Take (# of current turn x 10) fixed damage at the end of every turn
- Afterward, end turn and the attack pattern becomes empowered
dataList.flavor: "You have been made to forget all, and I to remember all."
